proposed_parameters.reason: Limit horizontal speed for stability in gusty wind conditions near tall structures
Controlled ascent speed to maintain stability when climbing near the building
Gentle descent speed to reduce oscillations in windy conditions
Moderate horizontal acceleration for smoother trajectory tracking in wind
Avoid aggressive climbs that could destabilize the drone in gusts
Stable descent acceleration to maintain control
Set return-to-launch altitude above the 200m building with margin for safety
Allow vertical envelope to cover the building height plus margin
Safe takeoff altitude before approaching the tall structure
